commit.message: "Bug 1298345 - Refactor CanvasRenderingContext2D's texture allocation code. r=Baseefa620"

diff:
"eefa620 Landing static build changes for OS2 Thanks to Javier Pedemonte <pedemont@us.ibm.com> for the patch. Bug #85283 r=mkaply r=waterson
diff --git a/widget/src/os2/nsGfxDefs.h b/widget/src/os2/nsGfxDefs.h
index 530918c..541e197 100644
--- a/widget/src/os2/nsGfxDefs.h
+++ b/widget/src/os2/nsGfxDefs.h
@@ -119,7 +119,7 @@ BOOL ExtTextOut(HPS aPS, int X, int Y, UINT fuOptions, const RECTL* lprc,
 
 BOOL IsDBCS();
 
-extern nsGfxModuleData gModuleData;
+extern nsGfxModuleData gGfxModuleData;
 
 #ifndef min
 #define min(a,b) (((a) < (b)) ? (a) : (b))
"
